name: Transmission Be Hard
description:
"This piece of trippy piece of software was found on an abandoned hard drive near an unspecified radio tower. It was rumored that its creators made it in 72 hours during a so-called "Game Jam" competition, never to be seen again. You're free to check the provided files for yourself at your own risk."

CONTROLS:
Use mouse pointer + LMB for everything. RMB support miiiight come later down the line if we feel like it.

game by: @PixelError
visuals by: @PrRoboTheCursed
OST by: @Glueue
sound design by: @CultOfSilence

originally submitted to:

Mini Jam 125: Signal
